metadata.title: CVE-2023-37453 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the USB subsystem in the Linux kernel through6.4.2. There is an out-of-bounds and crash in read_descriptors indrivers/usb/core/sysfs.c.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-6.6').
linux-aws package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1006.6').
linux-azure package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1005.5').

linux-gke package in noble is affected and may need fixing.

linux-lowlatency package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.

linux-raspi package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
